hw1

Class ParkingMeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • hw1.ParkingMeter

  • public class ParkingMeter
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a simple model of a coin-operated parking meter.
    Author:
    Yuxiang Chen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DIME_VALUE
      Value of dime coin in cents.
      static int NICKEL_VALUE
      Value of nickel coin in cents.
      static int QUARTER_VALUE
      Value of quarter coin in cents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParkingMeter(int givenMinutesForNickel, int givenMinutesForDime, int givenMinutesForQuarter, int givenMaxTime, int givenMaxCoins)
      It constructs a new ParkingMeter that is initially expired and contains no coins.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void emptyCoins()
      Empties all coins from this meter, without modifying the remaining time.
      int getCents()
      Returns the total amount of money, in cents, contained in this meter.
      java.lang.String getDollarString()
      Returns a String representing the total amount of money in this meter as a dollar amount showing exactly two decimal places.
      java.lang.String getHourMinuteString()
      Returns a String representing the time remaining on this meter in the form "hh:mm".
      int getMinutesRemaining()
      Returns the amount of time, in minutes, remaining on this meter.
      int getTotalCoins()
      Returns the number of coins currently in this meter.
      void insertDimes(int howMany)
      Insert dimes to the parking meter.
      void insertNickels(int howMany)
      Insert nickels to the parking meter.
      void insertQuarters(int howMany)
      Insert quarters to the parking meter.
      boolean isExpired()
      Returns true if there is no time remaining, false otherwise.
      void simulateTime(int minutes)
      Simulates the passage of time for the given number of minutes.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of this object in exactly the following format: hw1.ParkingMeter [Time remaining/limit, Coins count/maxCoins, Value totalCents]

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParkingMeter

        public ParkingMeter(int givenMinutesForNickel,
            int givenMinutesForDime,
            int givenMinutesForQuarter,
            int givenMaxTime,
            int givenMaxCoins)
        It constructs a new ParkingMeter that is initially expired and contains no coins.
        Parameters:
        givenMinutesForNickel - number of minutes to be added for each nickel inserted
        givenMinutesForDime - number of minutes to be added for each dime inserted
        givenMinutesForQuarter - number of minutes to be added for each quarter inserted
        givenMaxTime - maximum amount of time that can be purchased
        givenMaxCoins - maximum number of coins that can be inserted
